meals.name: Pre-Run Breakfast
meals.rationale: Provides ~1g/kg carbs before the run, as recommended for moderate intensity sessions less than 90 minutes (ACSM2016, Gejl2021). The oatmeal provides sustained energy, while the banana offers quick-releasing carbohydrates. Almonds contribute healthy fats. Sodium content is low, but will be addressed intra-workout.
israel_alternatives: Instant oatmeal with fruit and nuts
Bread with tahini and date honey

meals.name: Pre-Run Hydration
meals.rationale: Provides additional hydration and electrolytes before the run. Aiming for ~5ml/kg fluid with ~500mg/L sodium (ACSM2016).
israel_alternatives: Homemade electrolyte drink (water, salt, lemon juice)

meals.name: Intra-Workout Fuel
meals.rationale: Provides ~30g carbohydrate per hour as recommended for workouts about an hour long, especially at high intensity (ACSM2016, ISSN2017). Focus on glucose or maltodextrin sources. Water helps with hydration.

meals.name: Post-Run Recovery

foods.item: Protein Shake (Whey Protein with Fruit and Milk)

meals.rationale: Provides ~0.8g/kg carbs and ~0.3g/kg protein within an hour of the run (ISSN2017). This aids in glycogen replenishment and muscle repair. Whey protein provides leucine to stimulate muscle protein synthesis.
israel_alternatives: Greek yogurt with fruit and granola

meals.name: Lunch

foods.item: Chicken Breast with Quinoa and Vegetables

meals.rationale: Balanced meal to continue recovery and provide sustained energy. Quinoa provides complex carbohydrates, while chicken breast offers a lean protein source and vegetables offer micronutrients.

meals.name: Snack
meals.rationale: Provides a quick energy boost and helps maintain blood sugar levels between meals.

meals.name: Dinner

foods.item: Salmon with Sweet Potato and Broccoli

meals.rationale: Provides essential fatty acids, complex carbohydrates, and protein for overall health and recovery. Salmon is rich in omega-3 fatty acids, sweet potato provides sustained energy, and broccoli offers micronutrients.

meals.name: Evening Snack
meals.rationale: Provides slow-digesting protein for overnight muscle recovery and berries provide antioxidants.
